name: Kids Love Puzzles
description:
Kids Love Puzzles
Beautiful puzzle game for kids. If your children love wooden shape puzzle this is perfect game for them.

Over thirty boards with progressing difficulty gives a lot of fun.
Universal app for iPhone and iPad.

Make your children happy and download "KIDS LOVE PUZZLES" for FREE.

-----------------------------------------
!!!IMPORTANT!!!

Try improved version

"KIDS LOVE PUZZLES EXTRA"

You can simply find it on AppStore. This app has improved graphics and twice more levels to solve. And it is FREE.

You can find it by searching "Kids Love Puzzles Extra" or "Eery Lab s.c"
----------------------------------------
publishers: Eery Lab s.c Grzegorz Studzinski, Adrian Kurek, Michal Okularczyk
